H0.text: A robin that builds a nest is an example of an animal whose behavior helps it find food when little is available.

H1.text: An owl that calls at night is an animal that has behaviors that help it find food when little is available.

H2.text: A duck that swims in water is an animal that has a behavior which helps it find food when little is available.

H3.text: A goose that migrates in winter is an animal whose behavior helps it find food when little is available.

A4.text: The cause of migration may be local availability of food
